docket_entries.description: Chapter 13 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than seven days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 02/9/2010, Schedules A-J due 02/2/2010. Statement of Financial Affairs due 02/2/2010, Attorney Disclosure Statement due 02/2/2010, Chapter 13 Plan due 02/2/2010, Debtor Statement of Current Monthly Income and Disposable Income due by 02/2/2010, Payment Advices Declaration Required by 11 USC Section 521(a)(1)(B)(iv) due by 02/2/2010, filed by RAYMOND J. STEELE of LAW OFFICE OF RAYMOND J. STEELE on behalf of SAMMY LALIECH GALLEGOS, ANITA ANDREA GALLEGOS (STEELE, RAYMOND) (Entered: 01/19/2010)

Meeting of Creditors scheduled for 03/03/2010 at 01:00 PM at US Trustee Meeting Room, 230 N. First Avenue, Suite 102, Phoenix, AZ (341-PHX). (STEELE, RAYMOND) (Entered: 01/19/2010)
